generic: Preserve legal mentions in source code
obligations.name: Preserve License and notices in source code
obligations.verbatim: The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies of the Software, its documentation and marketing & publicity materials,

generic: Reproduce license and legal mentions in documentation
obligations.name: License, notices and acknowledgment in documentation
obligations.verbatim: The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies of the Software, its documentation and marketing & publicity materials, and acknowledgment shall be given in the documentation, materials and software packages that this Software was used.

generic: Display legal mentions in the user interface (if applicable)
obligations.name: License, notices and acknowledgment in Program
obligations.verbatim: acknowledgment shall be given in the documentation, materials and software packages that this Software was used.
